name: Controller Quartet [OUYA]
description:
Controller Quartet was originally designed and built by DESK INK for the OUYA Winter Game Jam 2020.

Play melodies and stack chords with Controller Quartet.

Embrace all the Bb key has to offer! Bb! C! and many more notable frequencies!!

Controls:

Face Buttons: Play Notes

L1/R1: Select Octave

D-Pad Up/Down: Accidentals

R2: Credits

Follow @bherdm on Twitter for more DESK INK games.
